# maxMotionTransformCount

**Instance Property**

Controls the maximum number of motion transforms in the motion transform buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var maxMotionTransformCount: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

You are responsible for ensuring that final number of motion transforms at build time that the buffer [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4IndirectInstanceAccelerationStructureDescriptor/motionTransformCountBuffer] references is less than or equal to this number.
